feed.title: Track Awesome Tmux Updates Weekly

entry.content:
Plugins

  • tmux-click-copy (‚≠ê4) word/line copy on double/triple click without fixed timeout and without remaining stuck in copy mode

entry.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Jul 31 - Aug 06, 2023
entry.content:
Tools and session management

  • tmux-nav-master (‚≠ê6) Easy cross-navigation between tmux and other terminal applications.

Themes

  • tmux-base16-statusline (‚≠ê28) Statusline based on base16-shell (‚≠ê253)
  • tmux-colors-solarized (‚≠ê1.1k) A color theme for the tmux terminal multiplexer using Ethan Schoonover‚Äôs Solarized color scheme
  • tmux-dark-notify (‚≠ê67) - Make tmux's theme follow macOS dark/light mode.
  • tmux-power (‚≠ê618) 8 powerline style themes for tmux, easily to expand.
  • tmux-snazzy (‚≠ê18) Elegant tmux theme with bright colors
  • tmux-themepack (‚≠ê1.7k) Various themes for tmux
  • tokyo-night-tmux (‚≠ê455) tokyo-night theme for tmux
  • tomorrow (‚≠ê47): 5 flavors of Tomorrow theme based on specifications from Tomorrow Theme (‚≠ê14k) (i.e. dark/blue and light).

Plugins

  • tmux-keylocker (‚≠ê5) Lock away your tmux keybinds temporarely.
entry.summary: 10 awesome projects updated on Jul 31 - Aug 06, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Jan 18 - Jan 24, 2021
entry.content:
Tutorials

  • Tmux crash course
  • Tmux and Vim together

Configuration

  • Guide to customizing tmux.conf
  • tmux yank to system clipboard A way to get the System Clipboard to work with tmux yank on a Mac via pbcopy and linux via xclip

Tools and session management

  • libtmux (‚≠ê1.1k) Python API for tmux
  • teamocil (‚≠ê2.4k) A simple tool used to automatically create windows and panes in tmux with YAML files
  • tmuxp (‚≠ê4.2k) üíª tmux session manager and python library

Books / Development and testing

  • tmux 2: Productive Mouse-Free Development
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Jan 18 - Jan 24, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Apr 04 - Apr 10, 2016
entry.content:
Tutorials

  • Automatically start tmux on SSH
  • Tmux primer

Cheat Sheets

  • tmux-cheatsheet.markdown

Configuration

  • Example tmux config (‚≠ê1.8k) üìó Example tmux configuration - screen + vim key-bindings, system stat, cpu load bar
  • practical tmux
  • tmux-extra (‚≠ê119) Configuration and scripts for sane Tmux default behavior

Tools and session management

  • powerline (‚≠ê15k) Statusline plugin for vim, and provides statuslines and prompts for several other applications including tmux
  • tmuxifier (‚≠ê1.4k) Tmuxify your Tmux. Powerful session, window & pane management for Tmux.
  • tmuxinator (‚≠ê13k) Manage complex tmux sessions easily

Plugins

  • tmux2html (‚≠ê724) üêà Render full tmux windows or individual panes as HTML
  • tmux-plugins Official tmux plugins
    • tmux-continuum (‚≠ê3.6k) Continuous saving of tmux environment. Automatic restore when tmux is started. Automatic tmux start when computer is turned on.
    • tmux-copycat (‚≠ê1.1k) A plugin that enhances tmux search
    • tmux-fpp (‚≠ê321) Quickly open any path on your terminal window in your $EDITOR of choice!
    • tmux-logging (‚≠ê1.1k) Easy logging and screen capturing for Tmux.
    • tmux-open (‚≠ê666) Tmux key bindings for quick opening of a highlighted file or url
    • tmux-pain-control (‚≠ê792) standard pane key-bindings for tmux
    • tmux-resurrect (‚≠ê12k) Persists tmux environment across system restarts.
    • tmux-sessionist (‚≠ê437) Lightweight tmux utils for manipulating sessions
    • tmux-sidebar (‚≠ê573) A sidebar with the directory tree for the current path. Tries to make tmux more IDE like.
    • tmux-tpm (‚≠ê13k) Tmux Plugin Manager
    • tmux-urlview (‚≠ê281) Quickly open any url on your terminal window! (No commits since 2016, see tmux-urlscan or tmux-fzf-url for a maintained alternative.)
    • tmux-yank (‚≠ê2.9k) Tmux plugin for copying to system clipboard. Works on OSX, Linux and Cygwin.

Plugins / Development and testing

  • tmux-example-plugin (‚≠ê47) Example Tmux plugin that actually demonstrates how to build plugins for Tmux
  • tmux-test (‚≠ê16) A small framework for isolated testing of tmux plugins.

Miscellaneous / Development and testing

  • Statically linked tmux Install new version without root access
  • vim-tmux (‚≠ê336) vim plugin for tmux.conf
entry.summary: 15 awesome projects updated on Apr 04 - Apr 10, 2016
